channel.title: [317]Good Sources and Clients[317]
channel.description:
[b]I've made a [u]GROUP[/u]([b]NOT LIST[/b] :P) of the servers which are/were very usefull for me. Maybe you can use a server from this [u]GROUP[/u]! Please Respect the [u]OWNERS[/u], their [u]NOT[/u] mine.
By the way, if your server is at this list, but you don't want it in it, pm me and i'll Remove.[/b]
[b]EvolutionX Source & Client:[/b] [u]Client[/u] Download: [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/362579210/EvolutionX_Client.rar]EvolutionX_Client[/url] [u]Source[/u] Download: [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/362580043/EvolutionX_Source.rar]EvolutionX_Source[/url] [b]Link to Topic:[/b][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,426295.0.html] EvolutionX Topic[/url]
[b]Nonstop-Pk Source & Client:[/b] [u]Client[/u] Download: [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/362589063/Nonstop-pk_Client.rar]Nonstop-Pk Client[/url] [u]source[/u] Download: [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/362589160/Nonstop_pk_source.rar]Nonstop-Pk Source[/url] [b]Link to Topic:[/b][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,425921.0.html] Nonstop-Pk Topic[/url]
[b]Hellz-Pk Source & Client:[/b] [u]Client[/u] Download:[url=http://rapidshare.com/files/362583368/Hellz-Pk_Client.zip] Hellz-Pk Client[/url] [u]Source[/u] Download:[url=http://rapidshare.com/files/362584248/Hellz-Pk_Source.zip]Hellz-Pk Source[/url] [b]Link to Topic:[/b][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,428572.msg3146075/topicseen.html#msg3146075] Hellz-Pk Topic[/url]
[b]Poompscape Source & Client:[/b] [u]Client[/u] Download: [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/362722379/Poompscape_NEW_clients.rar]Poompscape Client[/url] [u]Source[/u] Download: [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/362722963/Poompscape_V4.rar]Poompscape Source[/url] [b]Link to Topic:[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,423889.msg3112954.html#msg3112954]Poompscape Topic[/url]
[b]Rune-Immune Source & Client:[/b] [u]Client[/u] Download:[url=http://rapidshare.com/files/362586229/Rune-Immune_Client.zip] Rune-Immune Client[/url] [u]Source[/u] Download:[url=http://rapidshare.com/files/362586594/Rune-Immune_Server_v3.zip] Rune-Immune Source[/url] [b]Link to Topic:[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,396434.msg2944337/topicseen.html#msg2944337] Rune-Immune Topic[/url]
[b]Pk Planet Source & Client:[/b] [u]Client[/u] Download: [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/362725687/Pk_Planet_Client_V6.rar]Pk Planet Client[/url] [u]Source[/u] Download: [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/362723506/Pk_Planet_Source_V3.rar]Pk Planet Source[/url] [b]Link to Topic:[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,419547.0.html]Pk Planet Topic[/url]
[b]SozScape Client[/b] [u]Client[/u] Download: [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/362733735/SozScape_V2.5.rar]SozScape Client[/url] [b]Link to Topic:[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,426987.0.html]SozScape Topic[/url] ( Only a client, What a shame! But it's a Real nice Client )
[b]SysCape Client&Source[/b] [u]Client[/u] Download: [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/362746044/SysCape_Final_Client_editable.rar]SysCape Client[/url] [u]Source[/u] Download: [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/362746394/SysCape_server_v_3.0.rar]SysCape Source[/url] [b]Link to Topic:[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,421037.0.html]SysCape Topic[/url] ( There's one glitch in it, they said the games necklace is working but it isn't )
[b]Edgeville PK'ing Source&Client[/b] [u]Client[/u] Download: [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/362753086/Edgeville_Pking_Client__OPEN_SOURCE_.rar]Edgeville PK'ing Client[/url] [u]Source[/u] Download: [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/362748207/Edgeville_Pking__OPEN_SOURCE_.rar]Edgeville PK'ing Source[/url] [b]Link to Topic:[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,420775.0.html]Edgeville PK'ing Topic[/url] ( I like that Scoreboard Tab )
[b]Please tell me if a link to a topic or download isn't working.[/b] [b]Anyway Good Luck![/b]

item.title: [317]Good Sources and Clients[317]
item.dc:creator: @john5689 john5689
item.description:
@john5689 wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:10, topic:332635”][quote=rules]
7) Don’t post download lists! These are a waste of your time. If someone wants a source, they can use the search button.
[/quote]
there you go.[/quote]

lol that rule is stupid i think we shuld be able to make server lists. It does save searching. Also because when u do search it just comes up with shit we don’t want

Pascalrs2:

What is the problem if i can help people with this?

Nothing. U made a list 4 people 2 look at and you have gotten people to download them servers u placed.

Read full topic
